title: amazing
review: images of the world, what was, that make you ache because you miss it like a dead loved onea battle between a strong urge for the thing to not ever be revealed, and the desire to open it upthe love of all things, things that kill or replace other things, like everyone, being torn between loyalties to all things a sense of loss of all the moments in the world, without which they could not be feltthe girl/woman relentlessly giving in the snow, food where is the mother? in herself giving her life for the son, for us like the fish under the tobacco plant
